import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./App.css";// Dynamically set API base URL based on environment
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||"http://localhost:5000/api/notes";function App(){const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[description,setDescription]=useState("");const[editId,setEditId]=useState(null);// Fetch all notes
const fetchNotes=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL));setNotes(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching notes:",err);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchNotes();},[]);// Add or Update Note
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!title||!description){alert("Please fill in both fields!");return;}try{if(editId){// Edit existing note
const res=await axios.put("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(editId),{title,description});setNotes(notes.map(note=>note._id===editId?res.data:note));setEditId(null);}else{// Add new note
const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL),{title,description});setNotes([...notes,res.data]);}setTitle("");setDescription("");}catch(err){console.error("Error saving note:",err);}};// Delete Note
const handleDelete=async id=>{if(!window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this note?"))return;try{await axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/").concat(id));setNotes(notes.filter(note=>note._id!==id));}catch(err){console.error("Error deleting note:",err);}};// Start Editing
const handleEdit=note=>{setEditId(note._id);setTitle(note.title);setDescription(note.description);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDDD2\uFE0F My Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"note-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:editId?"Update Note":"Add Note"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),notes.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No notes yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:notes.map(note=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:note.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{children:["\uD83D\uDCC5 ",new Date(note.date).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleEdit(note),className:"edit-btn",children:"\u270F\uFE0F Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(note._id),className:"delete-btn",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Delete"})]})]},note._id))})]});}export default App;
